price: いや、われら*はその指先まで、きっちり整え（て組み立て、生前と同じ状態に復活させ）ることが出来る。
arabic: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُۥ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: balā qādirīna ʿalā an nusawwiya banānahu
